case.title: Case Selection
case.content: Select the case for which this hearing is scheduled. This field is mandatory and links the hearing to the case record.

authority.title: GST Authority
authority.content: The GST authority issuing the notice or order (e.g., Commissioner, Joint Commissioner, Tribunal). This field is mandatory for tracking authority hierarchy.

forum.title: Legal Forum
forum.content: The legal forum where the hearing takes place (e.g., GSTAT Mumbai, High Court Delhi). This field is mandatory for venue tracking.

judge.title: Judge Assignment
judge.content: Select the judge presiding over the hearing (optional). The judge must be assigned to the selected authority.

date.title: Hearing Date
date.content: The date when the hearing is scheduled. Past dates are not allowed.

time.title: Hearing Time
time.content: The time when the hearing starts. Use 24-hour format (HH:mm).

agenda.title: Hearing Agenda
agenda.content: Brief description of what will be discussed or presented in the hearing.

notes.title: Additional Notes
notes.content: Any additional instructions, requirements, or observations about the hearing.

outcome.title: Hearing Outcome
outcome.content: Select the outcome of the hearing. Choose 'Adjournment' if the hearing was postponed to a future date.

outcomeText.title: Outcome Notes
outcomeText.content: Provide a detailed summary of what transpired during the hearing, including key discussions, decisions made, and any instructions from the authority.

nextHearingDate.title: Next Hearing Date
nextHearingDate.content: If the hearing was adjourned, specify the date for the next hearing. This date will be used to automatically create a follow-up hearing.
